general.name: Personal Information
general.description: Highly skilled Frontend Developer with over 3 years of experience specializing in Angular and React/React Native. Proficient in developing scalable and responsive web and mobile applications. Possesses a strong understanding of front-end technologies and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, and React Native. Demonstrates a solid grasp of UI/UX principles and the ability to create intuitive user interfaces. Proven track record of delivering high-quality code on time and within budget. Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail. Committed to staying updated with the latest industry trends and continuously improving technical skills. A team player with effective communication and collaboration abilities.

entries.description:
• ﻿As a Frontend Developer at Ernst and Young, I am part of a dynamic team responsible for delivering cutting-edge solutions for our esteemed client, TATAAIG. I specialize in leveraging a wide range of technologies, including Jira, Angular 14, 12, 10, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and more. My role revolves around crafting user-friendly interfaces and seamless experiences for TATAAIG's customers.
  •  Using Angular, I develop scalable and maintainable front-end applications that align with the best practices and industry standards. I have extensive experience with Angular versions 14, 12, and 10, enabling me to leverage the latest features and enhancements for an enhanced user experience.
  • Additionally, I have experience in integrating APIs from backend services, ensuring seamless communication between the front-end and back-end systems. I am well-versed in working with API wrappers and possess a comprehensive understanding of RESTful architecture.
  • My experience with Jira allows me to effectively manage project tasks, track progress, and communicate with team members and stakeholders. I am skilled at utilizing Jira's features to streamline development processes and ensure timely project delivery.

• Developed a reactive form in Angular 13, ensuring seamless data input validation and enhancing user experience.
  •  ﻿Integrated APIs using GET and POST methods to fetch and submit data, improving data exchange between the front-end and back-end systems.
  •  Utilized promises and observables in Angular to manage asynchronous operations efficiently and enhance application performance.
  •  Designed and developed a Job Searching app in Ionic, providing users with a seamless and intuitive job search experience.
  •  Created a Resume Making app in Ionic, enabling users to generate professional resumes quickly and easily.
  •  Developed an attendance app with geotracking and face recognition features, ensuring accurate and secure attendance management for employees.
  •  Implemented a task management module within the attendance app, enabling users to create, assign, and track tasks effectively.
  •  Collaborated with cross-functional teams including designers, backend developers, and quality assurance testers to ensure the seamless integration and delivery of high-quality applications.

 Conducted code reviews and provided constructive feedback to peers, promoting code quality and adherence to best practices.

 Stayed up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies, actively seeking opportunities to enhance technical skills and knowledge.

 Developed responsive and user-friendly web applications using Angular and React frameworks.

skills.name: Nodejs, ExpressJS, Jasmine, Jira, AWS Console
Restful API, JSON, AJAX JQUERY, Tailwind, Bootstrap
